title: Matter now available on over 100 million Echo devices thanks to recent update
description: In addition to expanding support for Matter, Amazon enters a new partnership with smart home company Eve Systems.

title: Microsoft just broke the best way to make Chrome your default browser
description: A recent Windows update just up and disabled Google Chrome's built-in default browser switching tool, further escalating the brewing browser war between the two tech giants.

title: Mobile phone sales have fallen once again, despite some signs of recovery
description: Samsung and Apple have both had a strong quarter, with the former regaining pole position.

title: BenQ’s new 4K projectors bring impressive brightness and better HDR
description: BenQ's new projector trio is packed with powerful brightness specs and HDR features, and there's also Android TV for streaming.

title: Online stores are being hijacked with fake forms to steal credit card details
description: Hackers are breaking into stores and adding their own payment forms which sometimes look even better than the real thing.

title: Windows 11 Clock has stopped working with Spotify and there's no fix in sight
description: The Spotify/Clock app integration introduced to Windows 11 in 2021 no longer works, and Microsoft doesn't seem to care.

title: The browser wars just took another twist in the battle to topple Google Chrome
description: The world's second-most popular browser choice might surprise you.

title: Neato robot vacuums bite the dust – here's what the shutdown means for you
description: Neato Robotics is being shut down, marking the end of a true robot vacuum pioneer.

title: Like Apple Watch, Google's Pixel 7 might soon look after your hearing
description: According to recent leaks, your Google Pixel might soon gain the ability to detect noise that could damage your hearing.

title: New JBL portable speakers take on Sonos with Wi-Fi and Dolby Atmos support
description: The JBL Charge 5 and Boombox 3 get upgraded versions with Wi-Fi to challenge the Sonos Roam, and the Boombox gets Atmos.

title: AMD and Samsung could team up for a new wave of super-fast Chromebooks
description: A leak has suggested that AMD could be switching over to Samsung’s 4nm manufacturing process for new mystery CPUs.

title: This vicious new malware version is now targeting password managers
description: ViperSoftX has been around for a while, but now it's more powerful than ever, and targeting popular password managers.

title: Apple deploys its new Rapid Security Response tool for the first time
description: OS versions are getting a little (a) ticker to symbolize a patch being installed.

title: Apple and Google are teaming up to tackle AirTag stalking – and it's about time
description: Apple and Google (along with Tile, Samsung, and others) are working on a detector of unwanted AIrTags and Bluetooth trackers.

title: Microsoft Edge is trying some sneaky tricks to become your default browser
description: Microsoft Teams and Outlook links will now open in Edge as default.
